title: Ultimate skin 2014?
body:
We need to see a ultimate skin in the next 8 days or we will be angry because you broke your promise of releasing one every year. {{summoner:3}} 

  please release it fast!!.  {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: The ultimate was released, it was for ... Sumoners Rift

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-23T22:40:34.613+0000)
>
> The ultimate was released, it was for ... Sumoners Rift

that better not be riots lame excuse for no real skin, the new rift looks like a water colored comic book, aka shittty

> [{quoted}](name=Skittlez n Purp,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2014-12-24T01:02:19.441+0000)
>
> that better not be riots lame excuse for no real skin, the new rift looks like a water colored comic book, aka shittty

The new rift is awesome. Also, a lot of people think it's for sona. Since files were added related to a "djsona" or something.

nooo pls not another sona skin 
Ive been waiting for a new zed skin forever
sona already has a lot of cool skins like penta kill and arcade sona

penta.. kill.. sona..
its litey the grosest skin in existence, and they didnt even updated it with her rework. guqin remained also untouched,
they didnt even bother to do new models for them, like they did for karth, sion, and twitch. also, i would love to see an ultimate skin for sona, after all those nerfs she recieved :v
im done arguing, zed needs a new skin is all im saying

i think there are placeholder splash files for zed on pbe, so maybe there will be one next year
but saying that pentakill sona is great, then.. well yeahy you have quite a bad taste for me lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Emoto,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0000000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-26T20:37:45.474+0000)
>
> i think there are placeholder splash files for zed on pbe, so maybe there will be one next year
> but saying that pentakill sona is great, then.. well yeahy you have quite a bad taste for me lmao

Those along with Hec splash files have been there for ages.
I didn't say that skin was great I said arcade sona is great

Boo Hoo Zed only one skin {{item:3070}}. Except he has two.
Meanwhile {{champion:154}} hasn't gotten one in FOREVER and the one he has is not very good. Zed's skins are very nice.
zac is very hard to make a skin for and SKT is not a great skin

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-24T15:53:28.108+0000)
>
> nooo pls not another sona skin 
> Ive been waiting for a new zed skin forever
> sona already has a lot of cool skins like penta kill and arcade sona

Arcade Sona is her only skin that has any particle changes, but still doesn't have new VO or a new recall. 
She has multiple skins, yes, but only one of them is above-average (barely).

yea, but zed only has 1 skin not including his SKT which isn't very good
yet sona has multiple skins
and arcade sona is way above average everything about that skin is different from her classic including sounds movement and abilities

Whoooosshh.

Also, what. It looks much better than the old one. Hell, atleast it has some colors now.
the new rift is freakin awesome

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-23T22:40:34.613+0000)
>
> The ultimate was released, it was for ... Sumoners Rift

What?
an ultimate zed skin would be nice
no
yes ;)
I agree, I want an ultimate skin for anything, especially someone like Zed with a lot of potential, I heard they were going to release a teaser today but so far they have not, bump!
Sadly it's for sona...

> [{quoted}](name=Antonidas1,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2014-12-24T00:22:57.637+0000)
>
> Sadly it's for sona...

according to renekton guy its not, he allegedly made a new account

ulaccording to that guy, there should have been a trailer for the ultimate skin on the 23 of decwmber, but there was nothing. also, dropping an ultimate skin idea, after already creating tons materials would been a waste of money, including the songs that must been written for the skin. as well, making a ultimate skin for champions must is quite hard, so dont expect to see a replacement of dj sona in a month lmao.

so, riot would loose tons of money, and cant hold their promise to create a ultimate skin for once a year, just because people dont like a certain champ or think its a waste of time, because there arent many sona mains.

> [{quoted}](name=Emoto,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0001000100000002,timestamp=2014-12-26T20:28:26.117+0000)
>
> ulaccording to that guy, there should have been a trailer for the ultimate skin on the 23 of decwmber, but there was nothing. also, dropping an ultimate skin idea, after already creating tons materials would been a waste of money, including the songs that must been written for the skin. as well, making a ultimate skin for champions must is quite hard, so dont expect to see a replacement of dj sona in a month lmao.
> 
> so, riot would loose tons of money, and cant hold their promise to create a ultimate skin for once a year, just because people dont like a certain champ or think its a waste of time, because there arent many sona mains.

The guy that leaked Rek'Sai and DJ Sona said not to trust that leak that's going around reddit. 

Not to mention the fake leaker said Masteries would be reworked, which Riot has said there won't be season 5 mastery changes.

yeah, i heard it was posted by a different person, instead renekton, though, weird that most of the people believed the fake leak, because they dont want a sona skin

btw, its rumored that dj sona comes along with the jp server release of lol, so it probably wil be based off nikz.. and has probably also a cool vocoder voice and stuff :p

> [{quoted}](name=Emoto,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=000100010000000200000000,timestamp=2014-12-27T08:35:33.157+0000)
>
> yeah, i heard it was posted by a different person, instead renekton, though, weird that most of the people believed the fake leak, because they dont want a sona skin
> 
> btw, its rumored that dj sona comes along with the jp server release of lol, so it probably wil be based off nikz.. and has probably also a cool vocoder voice and stuff :p

That would be pretty cool, haha. 

If it is DJ Sona I hope they do a short animated film; that'd be amazing!

i meant miku* not nikz lmao
since vocaloid is all about synthesis, and since sona cant say anything at all, a vocoder or synth voice maker would make pretty much sense, giving her a cool appearance too with an cool robot voice :D
And pretty sure it is because she's been getting a lot of files for a SKIN called DJ that has multiple forms of music so...
I must have missed when he said that, but we don't know for sure yet until it's revealed.

> [{quoted}](name=Antonidas1,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2014-12-24T00:22:57.637+0000)
>
> Sadly it's for sona...

>sadly it's for sona
>it's for sona
>sadly
>sona

Uh.

While I would honestly hope it was Lux, Leona, or anyone else who doesn't have anything remotely close to a Legendary, much less an Ultimate, I'd want to see a radically-altered Sona with a new, well, voice. Arcade already comes pretty close to Miku, but they could take that a step further.
inb4 Bloodmoon Zed
*Crosses Fingers* Come on, Zilean Ultimate Skin.
CHRONOSHIFT DANCE!

the earliest we could see the next Ultimate skin would be Jan, if they release it sometime this month on the PBE. the only reason im doubtful of that is the fact that its the Winter season. Im pretty sure most of the people at riot are out with family/friends and i dont expect them to be back till late Jan/Early Feb.

Im hoping that if this is the case then we will hopefully get 2 Ult Skins in 2015 to make up for missing this year!

Yeah, there won't be any more PBE updates till after the holidays or we would have seen one by now.

As for 2, really doubt that, they only make at least one a year.

They said it would be January 2015 when it came out.

Not digging for sauce
No they haven't
Won't be getting one this year, plus they never promised anything. The skin chart says there's a 1-4% chance of an Ultimate Skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=88qs4xjW,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-23T23:48:44.812+0000)
>
> Won't be getting one this year, plus they never promised anything. The skin chart says there's a 1-4% chance of an Ultimate Skin.

im pretty sure it was not a %chance, but it was that 1% of the skins released in the year would be the ultimate
they had a perfect opportunity to release the ultimate xerath skin during/after the game mode where he was a boss
